data.title: Github Data Visualiser
data.desc: A website graphing Github API data about a user through the use of d3.js. The data analyses repos, contributers, the spread of commits and languages

data.title: CSB Module Lookup
data.desc: This is a website built using the MERN stack (Mongodb, Express, React, Node). I built this for me and my coursemates to find out who we share modules with.

data.title: Laughing Socks
data.desc: An E-Commerce site I built using React. It possess all the main feaatures you would expect a webstore to have (excluding payment)

data.title: Startup: EVE
data.desc: This is my first project as a freelancer. My client was the Irish startup 'EVE'. They asked me to design them a website for their upcoming app.

data.title: Audio Visualiser
data.desc: This is an Audio Visualiser I made using audio analysis tools made available by the p5 sound library. The song being used is: Top Songs of 2019 - A Cappella Medley/Mashup by Rosendale on YouTube

data.title: Vertigo App
data.desc: Vertigo was an app my team of 6 and I developed for TCD Adapt Medicine. It's an app that implements face tracking to help the rehabilitation of patients who suffer from inner ear damage or vertigo.

data.title: Chess
data.desc: This is a chess game made completely from scratch using p5.js. The game is basically completed except for the castling and the en passant rules and check/checkmate

data.title: 3D Audio Visualiser
data.desc: An Audio Visualiser in WEBGL which is used for 3D environments. The audiovisualisation is torus' plotted on a Fibonacci Sphere The song being used is: Sickick - Epic 50 Cent Mashup (Live)
